The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman.
